channel.title: Friends Job Nerd on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Job Nerd on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: No internet for me. No servers for me. No computers for me.
item.description: So i was reading the New Yorker Magazine when i noticed that all of the cartoons were making fun of .coms failing. And then i noticed that all my computer nerd friends who aren’t working for an insurance company or working for a hardcore company are getting fired and not getting jobs. All my friends that are graduating are not getting hired. I have a job at a non-tech .com, and many of my friends are getting offered small time contract work.
